\num{17} \eng{sure card} KaMDitavAgi gelulxva hUTa yA vayxkitx. 
\num{18} \eng{the card}  sariyAdudx: niriVkiSxsidudx; niriVkiSxsida vasutx, viSaya \mo vu. 
\num{19} \eng{throw up one's cards} soVlopipxko; kelasa, yoVjane \mo vugaLanunx keYbiDu.}

\bentry
\word[catch(1)]{catch}
\pron{kAYxcf}
\gl{\sakirx} (\BU\ matutx \BUkaq\ \eng{caught} \ucAcx -- kATf). 
{\dictmeaning{
\num{1} (\kanmu\ benanxTiTx) hiDi; hiDiduko; vashapaDisiko: \eng{catch a thief} kaLaLxnanunx hiDi. 
\num{2} (boVnu, gALa, pAsha \mo vugaLalilx) hiDi; sikikxsu: \eng{catch a fish} mInu hiDi. 
\num{3} (kelasa, parxyANa \mo vugaLalilx) hiDi; (samakekx) baru;
(jote) seVriko: \eng{go on in front, I'll soon catch you up} muMde
hoVgutitxru, nAnu beVga ninanxnunx seVrikoLuLxtetxVne.  
\num{4} hiDidiDu; hiDidukoMDiru; hiDiduko: \eng{a barrel to catch rain} maLe niVranunx hiDidiTuTxkoLuLxva piVpAyi. 
\num{5} (parxyANa mADalu sidadhxvAda vayxkitxya \vi) (reYlu \mo vanunx) 

\alnum{a} hiDi; hatutx; Eru. 

\alnum{b} sakAladalilxru; samayakekx sidadhxvAgiru. 
\num{6} (calanacitarx \mo vanunx) noVDu; IkiSxsu; viVkiSxsu. 
\num{7} (reVDiyo \mo vanunx) keVLu; Alisu. 
\num{8} (kelasa mADutitxruvAga, \kanmu\ tapupx mADutitxruvAga, EkAEki) (kaMDu) hiDi; noVDu: \eng{I caught the boys stealing apples from my garden} nananx toVTadiMda seVbugaLanunx kadiyutitxruvAga A huDugaranunx hiDide, patetx mADide. 
\num{9} (\kaparx, \AmA) gaBiRNiyAgiru; gaBaRvatiyAgu. 
\num{10} (\sA\ sUcisida sathxLakekx) hoDe; (peTuTx) koDu; ETu hAku: \eng{I caught him on the nose} avana mUgige oMdu ETu hAkide, peTuTx koTeTx. 
\num{11} (thaTaTxne) kasiduko; kitutxko; seLeduko. 
\num{12} (taDe) hiDi; sikikxsu; calanege taDeyoDiDx hiDidiDu: \eng{nail catches dress} moLe uDupige sikikxkoLuLxtatxde. \eng{put something to catch the drips} oNagalu neVtu hAkiruva baTeTxgaLanunx hiDidiDalu EnanAnxdarU hAku.
